sense.def:
Z izrazom
plus
eno število dodajamo drugemu, na primer
five plus three
. Z matematičnimi znaki to zapišemo kot 5*1A3.

Izraz
plus
pove, da je dejansko število ali količina večja od navedene.

seg.quote: ...my 25 years plus as a police officer.
They take the exams at 13 plus.

sense.def:
Izraz
plus
uporabimo, kadar tistemu, kar smo že povedali, dodamo še nekaj.

seg.quote: Now five people, plus Val, are missing.
He wore strange scarves and beads, plus he was English.
